Comment: And as usual our discourse about this is going to be ~100% about Trump lying, being stupid, being delusional…and approximately 0% about the fact that enough free-willed grown-ass adults in America consistently choose to mindlessly go along with the lies.  And also as usual this sentiment will be met with pathetic coddling excuses for these people - calling them brainwashed, victims of media, poorly educated (shoutout to all the well-off suburban MAGA people out there)…anything other than holding free-willed grownups responsible for their willful stupidity, moral failures, and shitty choices.  EDIT - my comment is a valid point about the general direction of our discourse. That does not come with an obligation to answer “sO wHaT dO wE dO tHeN?” (First rule of the internet - never follow an ad hominem contrarian down their rabbit hole).  My. Point. Is. we have the analysis exactly backwards. The lies are only told because they have an audience.
